statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, product_preferences FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01' AND last_login < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, product_preferences FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT customer_id, last_login FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE purchase_history ->> 'total_purchase_amount' >= '100';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, membership_status FROM customers WHERE membership_status = true;
SELECT customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE membership_status = true ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_category = 'Food' AND preference_value = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, preference_category, preference_value FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age < 25 OR age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM customers ORDER BY gender DESC, age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender='female' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE preference_score > 8 ORDER BY customer_id, category;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100

SELECT customer_name, purchases.purchase_date, products.product_name FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT customers.customer_name, preferences.category FROM customers LEFT JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id
SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(purchases.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preference_level FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;

SELECT rec_id, customer_name, product_name, recommendation_score FROM recommendations JOIN customers ON recommendations.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT customer_name, address, category FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preference_level >= 3 ORDER BY customer_name;
